Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Only show notifications when enterjoy tab is inactive

- Check if enterjoy tab is active before showing notifications
- System notification only appears when tab is not active
- Badge flashing only appears when tab is not active
- Page banner still shows when tab is active (via content script)
- Remove window.focused check (causes false negatives with DevTools)
- Use tab.active check only for better accuracy

Behavior:
- Active enterjoy tab: Page banner only (no popup, no badge)
- Inactive tab/background: System notification + Badge + Tab title flash

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
v0.941: Improve point timer notifications

- Remove page banner when enterjoy tab is active (minimize distraction)
- Show only timer color change when user is viewing enterjoy
- Improve system notification accuracy
  - Check both tab.active AND window.focused state
  - Notification shown only when:
    * User is viewing a different tab, OR
    * Browser is in background (not focused)
  - No notification when user is actively viewing enterjoy tab
- Code cleanup and improved comments

Behavior after fix:
- Viewing enterjoy tab + browser foreground: No notification
- Viewing other tab + browser foreground: System notification
- Browser in background (any tab): System notification

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
